sources.title: Pretzels (1930)
sources.description: A cat and mouse are out together when the cat tries to steal his mouse companions girlfriend. The mice escape to a club where they go dancing, only to be pursued by the cat again. But they eventually escape and fly off into the sunset. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/pretzels-1930/
